name: Scarring Spell-Like Ability
description: Your spell-like ability leaves mental scars.
prerequisites: Spell-like ability at caster level 4th or higher
benefit: Choose one of your spell-like abilities, subject to the restrictions described in this feat. You can use the chosen spell-like ability as a scarring spell-like ability three times per day (or less, if the ability is normally usable only once or twice per day).
special: This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, you can apply it to a different spell-like ability.
